integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.description: Configure the settings for Radarr and Sonarr integrations.
integrations.radarrAddressError: Please enter a valid URL (e.g., http://localhost:3000 or https://api.example.com)
integrations.sonarrAddressError: Please enter a valid URL (e.g., http://localhost:3000 or https://api.example.com)

services.title: Services
services.description: Configure the translation service for subtitle localization.
services.aIPromptDescription: The prompt is used to start a translation with an AI model. Note that extensive prompts cost more, while simple prompts may lead to more hallucinations.
services.anthropicDescription: AI translation is very costly in terms of pricing. Only use it when you know what you are doing and make sure automation is disabled.
services.anthropicApiKeyError: API Key must not be empty
services.deeplError: API Key must not be empty
services.deeplNotification: Please note that DeepL has usage limits. A single subtitle file typically contains between 60,000 and 120,000 characters. To avoid exceeding these limits, it's recommended to keep automated translation disabled.
services.deepseekDescription: AI translation is very costly in terms of pricing. Only use it when you know what you are doing and make sure automation is disabled.
services.deepseekError: API Key must not be empty
services.freeServiceLimits: Free translation services have rate limiting that may cause failures.
services.geminiDescription: AI translation is very costly in terms of pricing. Only use it when you know what you are doing and make sure automation is disabled.
services.geminiError: API Key must not be empty
services.localAiDescriptionPath: Local AI addresses usually consist of the following path
services.localAiNotification: API key is optional and can be left empty.
services.libreTranslateAddressError: Please enter a valid URL (e.g., http://localhost:3000 or https://api.example.com)
services.openAiDescription: AI translation is very costly in terms of pricing. Only use it when you know what you are doing and make sure automation is disabled.
services.openAiError: API Key must not be empty

translate.title: Translation
translate.sourceAndTargetDescription: Select a source and target language. Both the source and target are used to request translations.
translate.fixOverlappingSubtitlesDescription: Automatically resolves overlapping subtitles by adjusting the timing of the previous, current and next subtitle based on text length.

indexing.title: Indexing
indexing.description: The media indexing schedule controls the iteration with which Lingarr should sync with Sonarr and Radarr.

automation.title: Automation
automation.description: Set up automation. Note that if automation is implemented, you also need to configure the necessary
automation.scheduleLimitLabel: Limit the amount of translations per schedule
automation.defaultAgeThresholdLabel: Default file age delay for translation:
